content.query:
-- create calender view
CREATE VIEW gold.calender
AS SELECT* FROM OPENROWSET
(BULK 'https://azstorageadls.blob.core.windows.net/silver/AdventureWorks_Calender/',
FORMAT = 'PARQUET') as QUERY1

-- create customers view
CREATE VIEW gold.customers
AS SELECT* FROM OPENROWSET
(BULK 'https://azstorageadls.blob.core.windows.net/silver/AdventureWorks_Customers/',
FORMAT = 'PARQUET') as QUERY1

-- create product subcategories view
CREATE VIEW gold.product_subcategories
AS SELECT* FROM OPENROWSET
(BULK 'https://azstorageadls.blob.core.windows.net/silver/AdventureWorks_Product_Subcategories/',
FORMAT = 'PARQUET') as QUERY1

-- create products view 
CREATE VIEW gold.products
AS SELECT* FROM OPENROWSET
(BULK 'https://azstorageadls.blob.core.windows.net/silver/AdventureWorks_Products/',
FORMAT = 'PARQUET') as QUERY1

-- create returns view 
CREATE VIEW gold.returns
AS SELECT* FROM OPENROWSET
(BULK 'https://azstorageadls.blob.core.windows.net/silver/AdventureWorks_Returns/',
FORMAT = 'PARQUET') as QUERY1

-- create sales view 
CREATE VIEW gold.sales
AS SELECT* FROM OPENROWSET
(BULK 'https://azstorageadls.blob.core.windows.net/silver/AdventureWorks_Sales/',
FORMAT = 'PARQUET') as QUERY1

-- create territories view 
CREATE VIEW gold.territories
AS SELECT* FROM OPENROWSET
(BULK 'https://azstorageadls.blob.core.windows.net/silver/AdventureWorks_Territories/',
FORMAT = 'PARQUET') as QUERY1
